summary: This bill, the Livestock Owned by Communities to Advance Local Foods Act of 2025 (LOCAL Foods Act of 2025), amends the Federal Meat Inspection Act. It exempts certain livestock owners from inspection requirements if the slaughter, preparation, and transportation of meat products are exclusively for the owner's household, guests, and employees. Owners who utilize agents for these processes must maintain custody and proper identification of the meat products, as determined by the Secretary.
